markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 9" pfs="Standard">[Untwisting Iron Pillar](/Spells.aspx?ID=1254)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies. You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374)).
name: Untwisting Iron Pillar

text: Untwisting Iron Pillar Source Impossible Lands pg. 223 Cast Single Action verbal Duration 5 rounds --- You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies. You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).
